attributes.action: EU to produce full financial accounts.
attributes.background: The EU has never produced accounts of its financial affairs. This petition, as part of the Brexit negotiations is to make the EU produce accounts showing where all of the UK's contributions have gone.

rejection.details:
We are not sure what you are asking the Government to do. The EU already publishes annual accounts. You can find out more here:

http://ec.europa.eu/budget/explained/reports_control/annual_rep/ann_rep_en.cfm
